title: Expenses and benefits: maternity suspension payments

details.description: Tax and reporting rules for employers providing payments for maternity suspension on health grounds
details.body:
As an employer, paying an employee their normal wages while they’re on maternity suspension counts as earnings.

You must:

  • add the payments to the employee’s other earnings
  • deduct and pay PAYE tax and National Insurance through payroll

An employee who’s pregnant, has recently given birth or is breastfeeding may be suspended from work on maternity grounds if her continued attendance could damage her, or her baby’s, health.
